mcq.statement: Choose the correct indirect narration of the following sentence: "She said to the doctor, 'I will be going to Murree tomorrow.'"

options.a: She told the doctor that she will go to Murree tomorrow.
options.b: She told the doctor that she would be going to Murree the next day.
options.c: She said the doctor that she will be going to Murree the next day.
